statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, device_id, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High';
SELECT device_id, alert_timestamp FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM energy_usage_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, alert_type, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'high' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT device_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY device_id ASC, alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT MIN(energy_usage), MAX(energy_usage) FROM energy_usage_alerts WHERE device_id = 'a12345' AND alert_type LIKE '%usage%' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT COUNT(alert_id) AS number_of_alerts, AVG(energy_usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_usage_alerts GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 2 ORDER BY average_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyUsageData;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyUsageData GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
SELECT id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE energy_usage > 50
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage FROM EnergyUsageData GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_usage > 30
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT message, detected_at FROM alerts WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM energy_data WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT device_id, energy_value, measurement_time FROM energy_data ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT data_id, energy_value, measurement_time FROM energy_data WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM devices GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_energy_usage > 200;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Living Room'
SELECT device_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices GROUP BY location
SELECT pattern_id, device_id, pattern_description FROM energy_patterns
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM energy_readings WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices JOIN energy_readings ON devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id WHERE energy_readings.energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT devices.device_name, energy_patterns.pattern_description FROM devices LEFT JOIN energy_patterns ON devices.device_id = energy_patterns.device_id WHERE devices.device_name LIKE 'AC%' AND energy_patterns.pattern_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM energy_readings GROUP BY device_id HAVING readings_count > 5 ORDER BY readings_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT id, timestamp, alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type='sensor' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT a.id, a.timestamp, a.alert_type, u.username FROM alerts a INNER JOIN users u ON a.device_id = u.id WHERE a.alert_type='critical' AND u.username='admin';
SELECT a.id, a.timestamp, a.alert_type, u.username FROM alerts a INNER JOIN users u ON a.device_id = u.id WHERE a.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND u.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT ah.id, ah.alert_id, u.username, ah.is_acknowledged FROM alerts_history ah INNER JOIN users u ON ah.user_id = u.id WHERE ah.is_acknowledged = FALSE ORDER BY ah.id DESC LIMIT 5;
